title: Track point fault causing delays on East West Line

updates.text: [EWL] UPDATE: Train svcs btwn #JooKoon and #JurongEast have resumed. Free regular bus svcs have ended.
[EWL] UPDATE: Fault cleared, train svcs resumed. Free regular bus svcs is still available btwn #JooKoon and #JurongEast.

[EWL] UPDATE: Due to a track point fault, pls add 15mins train travel time btwn #JooKoon and #JurongEast. Free regular bus svcs btwn #JooKoon and #JurongEast. Train svc is still available btwn #JooKoon and #JurongEast.
[EWL]: Due to a track point fault, pls add 15mins train travel time btwn #JooKoon and #JurongEast. Free regular bus svcs btwn #JooKoon and #JurongEast. Our station staff will assist.
